boardgame.name: Race
Top Race
boardgame.description: Re-issue of Kramer's Formel Eins with tweaks._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Make as much money as possible, by becoming one of first at the finish line! If you place advanced RACE, you can also make money by betting!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;This game is based on running and betting;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Each player gets 200.000 credits and the deck of _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;Speed cards_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; is shuffled and divided among the players, who now sort out the cards in the order they want._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Now the _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;Contestents cards_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; are stacked face down. Each card matches the colours of the player pawns (Red, Yellow, Blue, Green, Purple and White). Now there will be an auction of the cards, where you figure our what to buy by the help of your _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;Speed cards_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;. Each bidding starts with 10.000 credits and is raised by 10.000 credits. All players have to have at least one (1) _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;Contestent card_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The last player to buy a card starts; (s)he plays a _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;Speed card_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; and move all the pawns as the card shows; a pawn can only be moved ahead; either straight or diagonaly; never backwards or sideways. Only one pawn is allowed on a spot, and it is NOT allowed to jump over another pawn._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;An example of a Speed card could be:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Blue: 6 spaces_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;White 4 - _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Black (means joker/free choise that is not on the card): 2 -_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Yellow: 1 -_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The speed cards also include _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;Sprints_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; and _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;Injury_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The player who's colour is first over the finish line gets 200.000 in price money. Second place pays out 150.000, 3rd 100.000 and so on._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Even if your colour have finished the race you continie playing your remaining speed cards._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The race ends when the fifth player have crossed the Finish line or when all _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;Speed cards_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; have been played._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The card dealing of both SC and CC plus the auction is now restarted and the next race goes on untill the agreed amount of races. The winner is the one with the most money._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Other games in Wolfgang Kramer's racing series include Detroit-Cleveland Grand Prix and Daytona 500._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;
boardgame.boardgamehonor: 1996 Essener Feder Best Written Rules Winner
boardgame.boardgamefamily: Auto Racing: Wolfgang Kramer card system

result.value: Some necessary text - easily memorized or small crib sheet
Moderate in-game text - needs crib sheet or paste ups
Extensive use of text - massive conversion needed to be playable

Excellent copy of this long out of print racing game; box and components in excellent, hardly played condition. As an additional bonus, the components to Cleveland/Detroit grand prix game (including boards) is also included. Box for the Detroit-Cleveland game is not available but all of this additional game_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s components fit in the Top Race game box. Great combination offer for two great racing games.

This is the newer Aldi edition. Two of the corners have been carefully taped (the box is a bit less sturdy then you would expect, it almost breaks by just lingering around). Apart from that, the game components are in like new condition, not even sure if the game has been played at all. (Alternatively I can offer the earlier ASS-edition as well. With this one, the box looks slightly worse: one split corner, a few dents and scratches. The components look like the game has never been played with. Same price, you chose)
